metadata.name: ❄Kamisato Ayaka | Tranquility
metadata.description:
❄️ Title.

Kamisato Ayaka. Tranquility.


❄️ Description.

The writing reads: "Shirasagi Himegimi" — this refers to Kamisato Ayaka's title (Japanese: 白鷺の姫君 Shirasagi no Himegimi), which means "White Heron Princess".

Closely related to the Japanese cultural identity, the koi fish symbolize luck, prosperity, good fortune, strength, and perseverance.


❄️ No watermark.

The digital non-watermarked version is not available elsewhere.


❄️ Complimentary wall scroll.

The highest bidder can receive, if they agree to it, the largest size full length print of this piece, similar to a wall scroll. The dimensions of the print are as such: 35" x 11.69" (About 3 feet long). The watermark I typically put on my art will be removed. I will contact the highest bidder via their communication mode of choice to arrange shipment. No payment is required for the print - it is complimentary.

For more details of my prints, you may visit my online art store here: https://meowsmarket.bigcartel.com/
